Knit the table

```{r}
library(dplyr)    
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(knitr)  # required for kable
library(kableExtra)
library(flextable)

kable(
  HMT,
  format = "markdown",
  booktabs = TRUE,
  escape = FALSE,
  col.names = c("Variable", "Mean", "95% HDI", "Memory", "Calorie", "GDP", "Vision"),
  align = c("l", "c", "c", "c", "c", "c", "c"),
  caption = "Means, standard deviations, and correlations with confidence intervals"
  ) %>%
  row_spec(row = 0, align = "c") %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = TRUE)
```
